1370: Conrad moved to Die lange straet3.D.5 after marriage.
Got married to Sywi at age 20 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Sywi, Werenboud, at age 21.
1372: Had a son with Sywi, Kerstiaen, at age 22.
1373: Lost son Kerstiaen when Kerstiaen was 2 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Sywi, Gerburgis, at age 26.
1378: Lost his wife Sywi while she was giving birth to Firiin in 1378.
Became caretaker of Werenboud, Gerburgis, Firiin at age 29.
1386: Lost son Firiin when Firiin was 9 years old.
